availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Prussia. Married Roseanna Bloom. Father of Ellen Bloom, Levi Bloom, Jacob Bloom, Isadore Bloom, Max Bloom, and Milton Bloom. Merchant in Louisville in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 155. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 87. “Nathan Bloom (1828-1887),” Find A Grave, memorial no. 64947293, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=64947293&ref=acom (accessed June 21, 2017).
